# funnel_workspace (Data Source)

Workspace data source



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `subscription` (String) Subscription ID to fetch workspaces from

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) List of workspaces (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Funnel workspace ID
- `name` (String) Funnel workspace name
